mapper.select: select q.id,q.subject,q.type,l.lessonname, q.optiona,q.optionb,q.optionc,q.optiond,q.answer from lesson l,questions q where l.taotiid=q.taotiid and l.teacherid=#{value}
select id,subject,type,taotiid, optiona,optionb,optionc,optiond,answer from questions where id=#{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO questions ( subject, type, taotiid, optiona,optionb, optionc,optiond, answer ) VALUES ( #{subject}, #{type}, #{taotiid}, #{optiona},#{optionb}, #{optionc},#{optiond}, #{answer} )
mapper.update: update questions set subject = #{subject}, type=#{type}, taotiid=#{taotiid}, optiona=#{optiona}, optionb=#{optionb}, optionc=#{optionc}, optiond=#{optiond}, answer=#{answer} where id=#{id}
